      • setCustomAttributes

        public void setCustomAttributes(HashMap<String,String> customAttributes)
        [OPTIONAL] - Set custom attributes. Project.getCustomAttributes() gets you the list of configured attributes for the project.
        Parameters:
        customAttributes - Key-Value pairs of custom attributes to set on the submission

      • setDueDate

        public void setDueDate(Date dueDate)
        [OPTIONAL] - Due date by when the submission should be completed in Project Director. This should always be greater than current date. If due date is not specified, Project Director will rely on the configured language model to calculate a due date.
        Parameters:
        dueDate - Submission Due date

      • setInstructions

        Parameters:

      • setOwner

        public void setOwner(String owner)
        [OPTIONAL] - Set the submitter to a user other than the logged in user.
        Parameters:
        submitter - Needs to be a valid Project Director user name.

      • setPmNotes

        public void setPmNotes(String pmNotes)
        [OPTIONAL] - Notes for the project managers
        Parameters:
        pmNotes - PM Notes (max 1024 charachters)
